description.value:
Your connection to one of the great elemental aspects of nature deepens, allowing you further control over its powers.

You gain the advanced order spell associated with your order:

  • if you're a member of the flame order, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Combustion];
  • if you're a member of the stone order, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stone Lance];
  • if you're a member of the storm order, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Powerful Inhalation];
  • if you're a member of the wave order, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pulverizing Cascade].

Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

value.value: flame stone storm or wave order
